Plays > The Yaguchi Ferry

– Click image to view.

The Yaguchi Ferry

(神霊矢口渡) (Shinrei Yaguchi no watashi)

Written By: Fukuuchi Kigai (福内鬼外)

First Staged: 1770

Reference: Hironaga, Shūzaburō, The Bunraku Handbook (Tokyo: Maison des Arts, 1976); Bunraku May 1975 Performance Program

Kashira:

Fukeoyama (老女形)

Kenbishi (検非違使)

Bunshichi (文七)

Genta (源太)

Kodanshichi (小団七)

Ofuku (お福)

Musume (娘)

Kintoki (金時)

Hagataki (端敵)

Yokanbei (与勘平)

Wakaotoko (若男)

Sanmaime (tedai) (三枚目（手代）)

Hayaku (端役)

Ōshūto (大舅)

Kani (かに)

Tedai (手代)

Performances:

May 1975: The Yaguchi Ferry

July 1986: The Yaguchi Ferry

September 1995: The Yaguchi Ferry

Scenes:

The Ferry (渡し場)

The Village School (寺子屋)

The Inn at Ishibe (石部宿屋)

The Rokkakudo Temple (六角堂)

The Obi Shop (帯屋)

Characters:

Tsukuba-Gozen (筑波御前)

Tokujumaru's wet nurse (徳寿丸の乳母 )

Minato (妻湊 )

Tomochiyo's wet nurse (友千代の乳母)

Rokuro (南瀬六郎宗澄)

Hyogonosuke (由良兵庫助信忠 )

Hachiro (篠塚八郎重虎)

Takezawa (竹沢監物秀時)

Onabe, a maid (腰元お鍋)

Omatsu, a maid (腰元お松)

Eda (江田判官景連)

Chief constable (捕手頭)

Chozo (馬方寝言の長蔵 )

Yoshimine (新田小太郎義岑)

Utena (傾城臺)

Ofune (娘お舟)

Rokuzo (下男六蔵)

Sorobei (しっかり候兵衛 )

Juji (三上十次)

Pinsuke (からのぴん助 )

Tonbei (渡し守頓兵衛)

Hachisuke (日傭の八助)

Tokujumaru (徳寿丸)

Tomochiyo (友千代)
